column4: hi, i just installed the postfix package, and i cannot access the smtp service from non localhost, on the server i can telnet to port 25, but not at my local machine
the postfix package is configured that way on install to prevent open relays
so how can i make my smtp server?
i ran that, and its still not available
what's your goal with postfix? local delivery only, or your own general email server?
being able to recieve email, and check it on the local machine
is this going to be mail server for a domain? or are you just trying to receive email from another smtp server?
tryign to telnet to port 25 from my home machine doesnt connect
yea, i can telnet into it from localhost
ah. ok. did you set up TLS?
when you telnet in from the localhost, do you see the STARTTLS string?
i got it now, it was a problem with the exim process floating around
